attributes.action: demand Student Finance England to take on a sufficient number of employees to effectively, efficiently and quickly deal with the outstanding loan and grant applications for academic year 2009/10
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As it stands, hundreds if not thousands will have to withdraw from their course due to delays in funding. Others, to cover tuition/accommodation fees, to take out high interest bank loans in the worst economic climate for years. 
The current wait for pending applications is 6 to 8 weeks minimum! Something needs to be done.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
